verses.verse: Then it <S%H1961>came<s%> about in the <S%H702>fourth<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> of <S%H4428>King<s%> <S%H1867>Darius,<s%> that the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> to <S%H2148>Zechariah<s%> on the <S%H702>fourth<s%> [day] of the <S%H8671>ninth<s%> <S%H2320>month,<s%> [which is] <S%H3691>Chislev.<s%>

Now [the town of] <S%H1008>Bethel<s%> had <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H8272>Sharezer<s%> and <S%H7278>Regemmelech<s%> and their <S%H376>men<s%> to <S%H9134>seek<s%> the <S%H9134>favor<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%>

<S%H559>speaking<s%> to the <S%H3548>priests<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> belong to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> and to the <S%H5030>prophets<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> "Shall I <S%H1058>weep<s%> in the <S%H2549>fifth<s%> <S%H2320>month<s%> and <S%H5144>abstain,<s%> as I have <S%H6213>done<s%> <S%H2088>these<s%> <S%H4100>many<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%>?"
Then the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> to me <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H559>"Say<s%> to <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> and to the <S%H3548>priests,<s%> <S%H3588>'When<s%> you <S%H6684>fasted<s%> and <S%H5594>mourned<s%> in the <S%H2549>fifth<s%> and <S%H7637>seventh<s%> months <S%H2088>these<s%> <S%H7657>seventy<s%> <S%H8141>years,<s%> was it <S%H6684>actually<s%> for Me that you <S%H6684>fasted<s%>?
'And <S%H3588>when<s%> you <S%H398>eat<s%> and <S%H8354>drink,<s%> do you not <S%H398>eat<s%> for yourselves and do you not <S%H8354>drink<s%> for yourselves?

'Are not [these] the <S%H1697>words<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H7121>proclaimed<s%> by the <S%H7223>former<s%> <S%H5030>prophets,<s%> when <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> was <S%H3427>inhabited<s%> and <S%H7961>prosperous<s%> with its <S%H5892>cities<s%> <S%H5439>around<s%> it, and the <S%H5045>Negev<s%> and the <S%H8219>foothills<s%> were <S%H3427>inhabited<s%>?' "

<S%H3541>"Thus<s%> has the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H8199>'Dispense<s%> <S%H571>true<s%> <S%H4941>justice,<s%> and <S%H6213>practice<s%> <S%H2617>kindness<s%> and <S%H7356>compassion<s%> <S%H376>each<s%> to his <S%H251>brother;<s%>

and do not <S%H6231>oppress<s%> the <S%H490>widow<s%> or the <S%H3490>orphan,<s%> the <S%H1616>stranger<s%> or the <S%H6041>poor;<s%> and do not <S%H2803>devise<s%> <S%H9567>evil<s%> in your <S%H3824>hearts<s%> against <S%H376>one<s%> <S%H312>another.<s%>'

"But they <S%H3985>refused<s%> to <S%H7181>pay<s%> <S%H7181>attention,<s%> and <S%H5414>turned<s%> a <S%H5637>stubborn<s%> <S%H3802>shoulder<s%> and <S%H3513>stopped<s%> their <S%H241>ears<s%> from <S%H8085>hearing.<s%>

"And they <S%H7760>made<s%> their <S%H3820>hearts<s%> [like] <S%H8068>flint<s%> <S%H4480>so<s%> that they could not <S%H8085>hear<s%> the <S%H8451>law<s%> and the <S%H1697>words<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%> had <S%H7971>sent<s%> by His <S%H7307>Spirit<s%> <S%H3027>through<s%> the <S%H7223>former<s%> <S%H5030>prophets;<s%> therefore <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H7110>wrath<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> from the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts.<s%>

"And it <S%H1961>came<s%> about that <S%H9201>just<s%> as He <S%H7121>called<s%> and they would not <S%H8085>listen,<s%> <S%H3651>so<s%> they <S%H7121>called<s%> and I would not <S%H8085>listen,<s%>" <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts;<s%>

"but I <S%H5590>scattered<s%> them with a <S%H5590>storm<s%> <S%H5590>wind<s%> <S%H5921>among<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1471>nations<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> they have not <S%H3045>known.<s%> Thus the <S%H776>land<s%> is <S%H8074>desolated<s%> <S%H310>behind<s%> them, <S%H4480>so<s%> that <S%H4480>no<s%> one <S%H5674>went<s%> <S%H7725>back<s%> and <S%H5674>forth,<s%> for they <S%H7760>made<s%> the <S%H2532>pleasant<s%> <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H8047>desolate.<s%>"
